噬菌体混合物可有效破坏医疗设备上的肺炎克雷伯菌生物膜研究人员研究了编码解聚酶多糖的噬菌体混合物是否可以有效破坏肺炎克雷伯菌生物膜。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Bacteriophage-cocktail-can-effectlyc2a0disrupt-Klebsiella-pneumoniae-biofilms-on-medical-equipment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230918/Bacteriophage-cocktail-can-effectlyc2a0disrupt-Klebsiella-pneumoniae-biofilms-on-medical-equipment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a0d49dc-bfd4-48ac-b0aa-8718b6112602 Mon, 18 Sep 2023 11:38:00 -0400 Bacteriophage cocktail can effectively disrupt Klebsiella pneumoniae biofilms on medical equipment
